 2013-02952013-03-07,  ,  ,  ,  LGC
ActParliament of Canada Act
PrecisAppointment of SONIA L'HEUREUX of North Gower, Ontario, Parliamentary Librarian, to be concurrently Parliamentary Budget Officer, on an interim basis, effective March 25, 2013, to hold office during pleasure until such time as a new Parliamentary Budget Officer is appointed.
